1: -module(cache_app_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("/usr/local/Cellar/erlang//26.0.2/lib/erlang/lib/common_test-1.25/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("/usr/local/Cellar/erlang//26.0.2/lib/erlang/lib/stdlib-5.0.2/include/assert.hrl").
    5: 
    6: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
    7: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
    8: -export([test_ttl/1, test_lookup/1]).
    9: 
   10: suite() ->
   11:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 5}}].
   12: 
   13: all() ->
   14:     [test_ttl, test_lookup].
   15: 
   16: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   17:     application:ensure_all_started(cache_app),
   18:     [].
   19: 
   20: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   21:     application:stop(cache_app),
   22:     ok.
   23: 
   24: test_ttl(_Config) ->
   25:     cache_app:create(test_table),
   26:     cache_app:insert(test_table, "key2", "value2", 1),
   27:     timer:sleep(1500),
   28:     undefined = cache_app:lookup(test_table, "key2").
   29: 
   30: test_lookup(_Config) ->
   31:     cache_app:create(test_table),
   32:     cache_app:insert(test_table, "key2", "value2"),
   33:     "value2" = cache_app:lookup(test_table, "key2").
